page.title: 14TOURIST ATTRACTIONS,LINCOLN.
page.content: {Lincoln }has gradually built up its tourist attractions having seen the success of towns such as {York.}The number of tourists has increased despite the {world recession. }The proportion of British tourists has declined but there has been an influx of {Americans.}Besides the historic buildings there are the many{festivals to come and see.The Bailgate{Christmas {Market }packs Castle Square each year. Lincoln's twin town {Neustadt}in West Germany sends over bands, choirs and wine!The Lincoln{Mystery Plays}are performed every 4 years in front of the Cathedral, floodlit against the West Front. A {Medieval Market }and a Castle {Joust and Fayre }are also popular. The {County Museum }and the newly opened{National Cycle Museum}are also well attended.The city benefits from the extra money brought in yearly
